item.title: Python 3 tricks
item.description: Disclaimer: This list is meant as a comprehension of cool tips and tricks I found on the internet. If you would like to contribute, or notice any mistakes or typos, please contact me or upload a pull request. If you think any material here can be considered personal property let me know and I will take it down. 1. Looping over a range of numbers Using range() is better than using a list (ex.
